reason: Bitcoin remains subdued and crypto investors are actively de-risking by turning to gold, which is hitting new records. Regulatory uncertainty from the White House meetings further adds to market caution. While specific altcoins may see jumps due to idiosyncratic news, the broader market sentiment for Bitcoin appears to be one of capital rotation out of speculative assets into safer havens, indicating potential for further downside or prolonged consolidation.
headlines: World token jumps 27% as Sam Altman reportedly eyes a biometric social network to kill off bots
Bitcoin remains subdued as gold races to new record above $5,400 following Jerome Powell remarks
Tesla made no changes to bitcoin holdings in Q4 as it booked $239 million digital asset loss
Paxos' gold token rakes in record inflows as crypto investors turn to the yellow metal
White House to meet with crypto, banking executives to discuss market structure bill
